channel.title: Some possibly useful 317 dumps
channel.description:
[size=36pt]If this is not allowed, feel free to remove it[/size]
I just thought I would provide a few files that contain information that's I've pulled from the cache:
[size=24pt]NOTE: This is to be used with servers. I don't believe it has any data that would be useful in client development...[/size]
Items.txt: Contains the basic information. Item Name, Description, Members-only, Stackable. [code] [0] Name: Dwarf remains Description: The body of a Dwarf savaged by Goblins. Stackable: false Members-only: true [End of Item][/code]
Npcs.txt: Contains Name, Description, Combat-Level, and Right-Click options. [code] [1] Name: Man Description: One of RuneScape's many citizens. Option-1: Talk-to Option-2: Attack Option-3: Pickpocket Level: 2 [End of Npc] [/code]
Objects.txt Contains Name, Description, and Right-Click options. [code] [8510] Name: Yew tree Description: A Yew tree is growing in this tree patch. Option-1: Inspect Option-2: Guide [End of Object][/code]
Interfaces.txt Not really sure if this would be a list of interfaces, but more of a list of "Frames" in each Interface. Never the less, it contains the text that appears in the top left corner when you mouse-over something, frame text(if any), the Parent Interface(The actual interface), and the Child ID(The current frame). [code] [6939] Top-left corner: "" Frame text: Proceed with caution. If you go much further north you will enter the\nwilderness. This is a very dangerous area where other players can attack you! Parent ID: 1908 Child ID: 6939 [End of Interface][/code]
Credits: SilentCJ for his custom interfaces, helping me figure out the ints.

item.title: Some possibly useful 317 dumps
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[size=36pt]If this is not allowed, feel free to remove it[/size]

I just thought I would provide a few files that contain information that’s I’ve pulled from the cache:

[size=24pt]NOTE: This is to be used with servers. I don’t believe it has any data that would be useful in client development…[/size]

Items.txt:
Contains the basic information. Item Name, Description, Members-only, Stackable.

[0] Name: Dwarf remains Description: The body of a Dwarf savaged by Goblins. Stackable: false Members-only: true [End of Item]

Npcs.txt:
Contains Name, Description, Combat-Level, and Right-Click options.

[1]
Name:	Man
Description:	One of RuneScape's many citizens.
Option-1:	Talk-to
Option-2:	Attack
Option-3:	Pickpocket
Level:	2
[End of Npc]

Objects.txt
Contains Name, Description, and Right-Click options.

[8510] Name: Yew tree Description: A Yew tree is growing in this tree patch. Option-1: Inspect Option-2: Guide [End of Object]

Interfaces.txt
Not really sure if this would be a list of interfaces, but more of a list of “Frames” in each Interface. Never the less, it contains the text that appears in the top left corner when you mouse-over something, frame text(if any), the Parent Interface(The actual interface), and the Child ID(The current frame).

[6939] Top-left corner: "" Frame text: Proceed with caution. If you go much further north you will enter the\nwilderness. This is a very dangerous area where other players can attack you! Parent ID: 1908 Child ID: 6939 [End of Interface]

Credits: SilentCJ for his custom interfaces, helping me figure out the ints.

Read full topic
